metadata.title: NYMB Funny Animals Shower Curtain, Hippie Style Cool Panda Ride Pug Dog Running in Beach Bath Curtain, Waterproof Fabric Bathroom Decor Set with Shower Hooks, 69X70 Inches
features: Shower Curtain Materials: Durable waterproof polyester fabric.
Size: 69W x 70L Inches, preventing water from splashing out of the bathroom shower stall.
Feature: Waterproof, Non-fading, Non vinyl, Non PEVA, Easy to Clean and use.
Image: HD Pattern with digital printing technology, Highly restored effect picture, no color difference, No dyes, the design isn’t pixelated.
USE: Our shower curtain can be used as window curtains, tapestry, wall decor, wallpapers, Can be used in bathroom, living room, home, party, hotel, cafe.
description: Made of polyester fabric. Coordinates effortlessly with surrounding decors. Transform any bath into an elegant spa-like oasis with fabric shower curtain.Environment-Friendly: We use high quality eco-friendly ink for printing, there is no toxic or odors (better than the PVC, vinyl or plastic shower curtains).Providing a safe and healthy environment for you and your family.Our unique & modern designs match well with various color palettes of towels, rugs, bathroom mats and any other bathroom accessories

1 Don’t bleach or tumble dry.2 Machine wash cold or wipe clean with a damp cloth.3 Due to differences in computer monitors display, there can be color variations between the actual product and your screen.4 Product sizes that measured by hand lead to the difference between about 1-2 Inch due to everyone’s measurement technique.
